Summary: the best way to "catch" a ufo on film...
divs: Sighting DetailsI am not sure if this technology is out there, however, when you guys investigate ufo,s wouldn't it be great to have a camera on a 30 foot pole, with sensors going in all directions up, and then the camera can detect movement and have a high quaility zoomed perfectly with out movement of the allecged ufo, of course it would have birds and airplanes, but it should be worth going through that info for a real glimps of an amazing ufo. just a suggestion, rob from ohio.... it could be put in the "hot spots"
